items.question: Is the film really based on a true story?
items.answer: Outside the basis for the pen pal relationship director Adam Elliot had with his pen friend, also spanning 20+ years who also has Aspergers syndrome, it's largely fiction.

items.question: Max has named his snails Einstein, Newton and Hawking "after famous scientists". But was Stephen Hawking famous in 1976, or is this a goof?
items.answer: Wiki: "The mid-to-late 1970s were a period of growing public interest in black holes and the physicists who were studying them. Hawking was regularly interviewed for print and television"
